content.text: Hello, I am waiting tables to make ends meet while I finish my novel.
A fantasy novel about a woman who finds the cure for the common cold.
That is a great idea! I hope you publish it one day.
Thank you! I am also a loner who likes to spend time with my dog.
I am also a loner! I love spending time in the winter with my restored Mustang.
Wow, a restored mustang! That sounds amazing!
Thank you! It is my pride and joy.
I also have a favorite band, U2.
U2! They are one of my favorite bands too!
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to decorate my home with vintage furniture.
That sounds really cool! I would love to see it sometime.
You are welcome to come over anytime.
I would love that! Thanks for chatting with me!
You are welcome! Thanks for talking to me as well
